mapper.insert: insert into user_table(user_id, user_password, user_name, user_phone1, user_phone2, user_phone3, user_parentphone1, user_parentphone2, user_parentphone3, user_email, user_birth, user_school, user_grade, user_agree, user_date) values(#{user_id}, hex(aes_encrypt(#{user_password}, SHA2('bockgipoog541354',256))), #{user_name}, #{user_phone1}, #{user_phone2}, #{user_phone3}, #{user_parentphone1}, #{user_parentphone2}, #{user_parentphone3}, #{user_email}, #{user_birth}, #{user_school}, #{user_grade}, 1, now());
